name: Old Mill Village

google_reviews.author: Maya Buhler
google_reviews.review:
Ive lived here 2.5 years now. This place is a great location and there  are tons of amenities nearby in terms of parks and nature. Great apartment to have a dog in.

That being said, the management switched over a few months ago and things have gone downhill. Rent went up 300 a month, which was over 20% in just one year. Many neighbors on fixed income who have lived here 5-10 years have been forced to move because of it. Very sad.

We had a meeting with the prop manager about getting the extremely old windows replaced before winter. Currently, they are single pane, meaning they hold condensation after showers and whatnot. That has caused a rather bad mold problem each winter. We were told replacing them over summer was the plan, and a priority. We followed up multiple times, got window measurements ect. It is now November, the rainy season is upon us, and the property manager has ghosted us regarding the issue. Very frustrating, especially considering the ostentatious rent increase.

Regarding the issue with the windows, we sincerely apologize for any misinformation or lack of communication, as well as any frustration this has caused. Peak Management is actively looking at ways to improve the community, addressing items of most importance first. This year, weve addressed several concrete steps in need of replacement (a project still in progress) and allowed the electric company to upgrade their infrastructure. We are aware of the windows, and it is a high priority item on our list. We have collected bids from multiple contractors for this project, and we look forward to providing more information on this soon. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly at 360-295-8200 or oldmill@peak-management.com. We appreciate your feedback!
